summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2680 for the improvement of Fourteenth Avenue Northwest, from West Fiftieth Street to Market Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and surfacing where necessary; by constructing concrete sidewalks and curbs and gutters, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 31557, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
